meanings.definition: A low-growing plant with purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The aubrietia in the garden adds a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: I planted some aubrietia in my yard for a beautiful display.
meanings.sent3: The aubrietia and the daisies had a friendly competition for the best bloom.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a field of aubrietia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the aubrietia lingered in the air, sweet and delicate.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which aubrietia belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many different species belong to the aubrietia genus.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the characteristics of plants in the aubrietia genus.
meanings.sent3: The aubrietia genus was named after a famous botanist.
meanings.sent4: The aubrietia genus is known for its resilience in various climates.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the aubrietia genus reveals a world of biodiversity.
